name: Sony Alpha a5000 Mirrorless Digital Camera (Black) with 16-50mm and 20mm Lens Bundle

reviews.name: Sony Alpha a5000 Mirrorless Digital Camera (Black) with 16-50mm and 20mm Lens Bundle
reviews.reviewText:
Awesome camera, great quality pictures. Easy to use, in most cases superior auto handles the details beautifully. Play memories allows fun apps and picture modes.

Wish the screen was touch, and Apps a bit cheaper, but overoverall worth every penny.
reviews.title: Hello Quality!!

reviews.name: Sony Alpha a5000 Mirrorless Digital Camera (Black) with 16-50mm and 20mm Lens Bundle
reviews.reviewText: More camera then I ever thought I could buy for the money. Absolutely extrordinary picture quality...beyound my best expectations!
reviews.title: First DSLR-Awsome!

reviews.name: Sony Alpha a5000 Mirrorless Digital Camera (Black) with 16-50mm and 20mm Lens Bundle
reviews.reviewText: Camera takes beautiful pictures. Very easy to use.
reviews.title: Effortless pictures

reviews.name: Sony Alpha a5000 Mirrorless Digital Camera (Black) with 16-50mm and 20mm Lens Bundle
reviews.reviewText:
1. Not as small as you think.
2. No provision to hold lens cover - should have a opening to attach a string.
3. Option to imprint date on picture not available. This is not too difficult for Sony to do.
4. The WiFi option worked.
5.
reviews.title: Mirrorless Camera
